issue.title: [Ruby] gemspec has wrong msys2 dependency listed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4870](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4870). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
 ruby gemspec has wrong msys2 dependency listed

change mys2_mingw_dependencies to correct package

pacman -Ss arrow
mingw32/mingw-w64-i686-arrow 0.11.1-1
Apache Arrow is a cross-language development platform for in-memory data (mingw-w64)
mingw64/mingw-w64-x86_64-arrow 0.11.1-1 [installed]
Apache Arrow is a cross-language development platform for in-memory data (mingw-w64)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4870?focusedCommentId=16793195) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3881
